# Driving Record Request

You can request a copy of a driving record for yourself or other drivers that have given you their authorization.

A driving record mainly contains information about:

- [classes](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/drivers-licence-classes) associated with the driver's licence, as well as the status of the licence (valid, cancelled, suspended, revoked)
- the holder's [demerit point](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/demerit-points) bracket and the number of demerit points accumulated
- offences committed
- events related to driving a heavy vehicle, presented in an abbreviated format
- [conditions](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/conditions-added-to-licence) and endorsements added to the licence
- medical restrictions
- driving experience

Who can request driving records?

- You can request a copy of your own record or someone else's record, with the person's consent
- An insurer, an employer, a vehicle fleet owner or an investigator, for third parties who have given their consent.

### Online

Using [SAAQclic⁠ ⁠](https://saaqclic.saaq.gouv.qc.ca/saaqstorefront/en/login)

### BY PHONE

[1-800-361-7620](tel:18003617620)

### In person

At an SAAQ service outlet

For security reasons and the protection of personal information

You will receive a copy of the document **by mail** at the address that appears in your record within 5 to 10 business days after we receive your request.

### If you are outside Québec

#### Online

[Driving Record Request⁠ ⁠](https://saaqclic.saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en)

#### By mail or by fax

1. Complete the [Application for the Driver’s Abstract of a Person Residing or Temporarily Living Outside Québec  (PDF, 127.0 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driver-outside-quebec-form.pdf) on-screen and print it out.
2. Submit your request by mail or by fax:
   - Division de la diffusion (act. 850)

     Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec

     Case postale 19600, succursale Terminus

     Québec (Québec)  G1K 8J6
   - Fax: 418-644-7167

You will receive the driving record you requested by mail or by fax.

### If you are requesting one or more records of other drivers — Fees apply

1. Request authorization from each individual whose driving record you wish to obtain.


   - If you are the applicant, use the [Authorization for the Disclosure of a Driving Record by the Société de l’assurance automobile du Québec (PDF, 118.5 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driver-disclosure-form.pdf) form.
   - If you are acting as a representative, use the [Authorization for the Disclosure of a Driving Record by the Société de l’assurance automobile du Québec – With Intermediary (PDF, 132.6 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driver-disclosure-intermediary-form.pdf) form.

Authorizations must be less than 12 months old on the date on which we receive your request.

2. Complete the [Driving Record Search (PDF, 131.0 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driving-record-form.pdf) form on-screen before printing it out.
   - Make sure to arrange the authorizations in the same order as the driver's licence numbers listed on the form.
   - If you have an account number for your monthly billing, enter it in the appropriate box. Otherwise, enter your business’s identification number.
3. If you do not have an account at the SAAQ, pay by cheque or money order made payable to the Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec.  Consult the [applicable fees](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/saaq/rates-fines/fees-other-services) for each driving record.
4. Send your request, the authorizations and your payment to:

Division de la diffusion (act. 850)

Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec

Case postale 19600, succursale Terminus

Québec (Québec)  G1K 8J6

You will receive the driving records by mail within 10 business days after we have received your request.

Last update: July  8, 2025

- ## Contact us




Québec area: 418-643-7620

Montréal area: 514-873-7620

Elsewhere: 1-800-361-7620 (Québec, Canada, United States)

- ## Costs

  - **For your own record**: free
  - **For other records**: $15.50 per driving record
- ## Delivery time frame

  - 10 business days by mail
- ## Online services

  - [Driving Record Request](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/requesting-copy-driving-record)
- ## Forms

  - [Application for the Driver’s Abstract of a Person Residing or Temporarily Living Outside Québec (PDF, 127.0 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driver-outside-quebec-form.pdf)
  - **Businesses:** [Driving Record Search (PDF, 131.0 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driving-record-form.pdf)
  - **Applicant:** [Authorization for the Disclosure of a Driving Record by the Société de l’assurance automobile du Québec (PDF, 118.5 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driver-disclosure-form.pdf)
  - **Representative:** [Authorization for the Disclosure of a Driving Record by the Société de l’assurance automobile du Québec – With Intermediary (PDF, 132.6 KB)⁠](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/blob/saaq/documents/formulaires/driver-disclosure-intermediary-form.pdf)
- ## See also

  - [Checking the Validity of a Driver's Licence](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/checking-validity-licence)
  - [Demerit Points](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/demerit-points)
  - [Heavy Vehicle Driver Conduct Record](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/transportation-goods/conduct-record)
  - [Classes of Driver's Licence](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/drivers-licence-classes)
  - [Conditions Added to a Driver's Licence](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/drivers-licences/conditions-added-to-licence)

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That’s why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
